name: Smart Chips
description: Smart reply and action chips for RCS Business Messaging conversations

components.name: Smart Replies Carousel
components.description: Horizontal scrolling list of reply suggestions

components.name: Smart Action
components.description: Action chips with icons (call, web, location, calendar)

components.name: Smart Action Carousel
components.description: Horizontal scrolling list of action suggestions

props.chips: Array of SmartChip objects (reply or action type)
props.onChipClick: Function - callback when chip is clicked

designNotes: Reply chips use neutral gray colors
Action chips use blue accent colors with icons
Android variant has slightly smaller font size and border radius
Supports both horizontal scrolling and vertical stacking layouts
Icons are included for common actions: phone, web, location, calendar
